alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:28PM CDT until July 17 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Clay County in eastern Arkansas... North central Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Success, or near Corning, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Piggott, Corning, Campbell, Rector, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Reyno, Knobel, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, McDougal, Success, Peach Orchard, Datto, Glennonville, Saint Francis, Crockett, Stonewall, Tipperary and Hickoria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
